txt.en: 'I can grant you the knowledge needed to bypass Mirkwood Landing and enter Mirkwood directly.\n\n'Be warned that you will be unable to enter Mirkwood Landing once you have accepted my gift...'
'So be it! Once our pact is complete, you shall forgo Mirkwood Landing and enter Mirkwood Proper directly!'
This quest shall allow you to enter the sanctuary of Ost Galadh in Mirkwood directly without passing through LÃ³rien or the initial assault upon the Mirk-eaves.
Speak with Danath in the Eyes & Guard Tavern
Speak with Danath in order to bypass the requirements needed to enter Mirkwood.
